doc.name: DDEPutToken
doc.description: DDEPutToken is a test class used for testing the production of tokens. DDEPutToken has a single, typed, output multiport. A DDEPutToken object can output N tokens where 'N' is specified in the constructor. The current time of DDEPutToken at the time a given token is output can be queried after Manager.run() is finished.
doc.author: John S. Davis II
